thread.section_title: Oak Motors Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oak Motors | www.oakmotors.com
thread.title: TONI POTTS
thread.title_full: Oak Motors reviewed by TONI POTTS

author: TONI POTTS
title: TONI POTTS
text: I had a fine experience here. I was in and out within 2 hours, I was able to purchase the first car I chose without breaking the bank to put together the down payment. My wife and I were treated with respect, despite both being women who do not know much about buying cars. I was able to find a car in my price range with a reasonable payment even with a repossession on my record. Overall, a good experience.
